analytic.title: “Die Apostolische Kirche des Ostens” in Deutschland und ihre Erinnerungskultur an das Massaker von Semile

biblStruct.note: The article deals with the culture of remembrance of the Apostolic Church of the East in Germany, in which multidimensional interweavings of ethno-religious identification factors with cultural political aspirations become just as obvious as their differentiations. This complex mixture of long standing animosities and claims, which has received little attention so far, is to be investigated after an overview of the congregations of that church in Germany and their question horizons. Both views do not claim any completeness, rather they make clear how necessary research in this area is.

body.bibl: Rammelt, Claudia. “‘Die Apostolische Kirche Des Ostens’ in Deutschland Und Ihre Erinnerungskultur an Das Massaker von Semile.” Wiener Jahrbuch Für Kurdische Studien 11 (2024 2023): 153–62.
Claudia Rammelt, ‘Die Apostolische Kirche Des Ostens’ in Deutschland Und Ihre Erinnerungskultur an Das Massaker von Semile, Wiener Jahrbuch Für Kurdische Studien 11 (2024 2023): 153–62.
